welcome_message_body: Welcome to Porto Alegre, where the rich blend of cultures, beautiful parks, and vibrant music scene await you. Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's charm, explore its historic sites, and indulge in its delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Porto dos Filés
restaurants.description: Porto dos Filés is a steakhouse located in Porto Alegre.
restaurants.address: Av. Protásio Alves, 3226, Porto Alegre, RS, 90410-000
